tasks.title: Morning Tribute
tasks.description: Send your daily tribute of $25 every morning by 9 AM with a grateful message

tasks.title: Evening Gratitude
tasks.description: Send a thoughtful gratitude message before bed, explaining why you're thankful to serve Me today
tasks.reward: Sweet dreams knowing you've pleased Me

tasks.title: Workout Proof
tasks.description: Complete 30-minute workout and submit photo proof of your effort
